Articles.Content:
Made these with-in 1 day of buying the full game...

Screenshots in order:

1: Plane w/o Nuke

2: Taking off

3: Nice little Night time show-off

4: Plane w/ Nuke

5: The Nuke\'s Fins help with the real plane\'s stabilization.

6: In order to take off, it helps to Hold W and let in fall off runway... I don\'t know how to fix.

7: Night time show-off

8: To drop nuke without blowing up you have to fly up-side down.

A tip: post pictures if you want people to download your craft. Very few people will download it without a picture of some sort.

That said, welcome!
Don\'t worry I\'m working on the pics, when I was testing it I tried but I don\'t think I set my screenshot buttons yet.
